about_the_game:
BACKGROUND

Dark Age Empires is an open world survival game that can be played in single player mode or as an online multiplayer game on a dedicated server.

The game sets you in a world which has been under the control of a great empire that has ruled the land for centuries. It once spanned every corner of the globe.

But now the mighty empire is collapsing under the weight of its own dominance and fortune. The decay grows from within and those on the frontiers grow restless... A chaotic, dark age has begun...

Where do you fit into this dangerous changing world?

Do you have what it takes to not only survive in this dark age, but to rise up, fight back and create your own Dark Age Empire?

ABOUT THE GAME

You start with nothing, but the tunic on your back in a small village. Village NPCs will offer you quests, which will help you learn the game mechanics while advancing your knowledge of the world. Learn how to survive before you head out into the open world on your own or with a group of trusted friends, forming your own guild. You will need to hunt animals, gather recourses and increase your skills in the skill tree to advance. Stake your claim in the world by erecting a monument to keep your possessions safe, use the modular building mechanics to build your own village and defenses, the base from which to build your empire.

NPC villages dot the landscape, providing a place trade crafted goods for gold coin, coin which can be used to purchase items that you require.

Be sure to keep a careful eye out for Empire patrols and camps. The Empire is waning, but patrols are still dangerous, and will attack without warning at times. You are the reasons the Empire is losing control of this land. With a small, brave group, you might raid one of their camps, they offer great rewards to survivors of the fight.

FEATURES UNDER DEVELOPMENT INCLUDE:
• Procedurally generated world
• Play a standalone single player game
• Host your own dedicated server
• Play on an official dedicated server
• Modular building system
• Base building
• Full in-depth crafting system:
o Animal husbandry
o Carpentry
o Smithing
o Farming
• Weather system with seasons that impacts the player and their surroundings
• NPC enemies, wildlife and factions
• Areas of interest to explore
• Huge recent graphics overhaul

...and more...

Conquer land, build a stronghold, fight to drive other factions from your lands and rule where your ancestors once did!

Be aware! Others also strive to rule this land... Protect what you have built at all costs and thrive!

Can you rule a Dark Age Empire in your own right?

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10, 11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 compatible GPU, 8GB dedicated VRAM (GeForce GTX 1060 / Radeon RX 880) DirectX 11 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10,11
  • Processor: Ryzen 5 or Intel i5 or higher
  • Memory: 16 MB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 12 compatible GPU, 12GB dedicated VRAM (Nvidia RTX 3060 / Radeon RX5700) DirectX 12 compatible GPU
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
